search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for NetHunt CRM (nethunt-crm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Here is the official URL for NetHunt CRM's pricing page: [https://nethunt.com/pricing/](https://nethunt.com/pricing/) .

extracted_content.content:
Choose the right plan for your team
-----------------------------------

Monthly

Annually

best value

Basic
-----

Essential CRM tools for small teams.

$24 $30

per user/month, billed annually per user/month, billed monthly

[Start free trial](https://nethunt.com/web/?rg=GLOBAL&l=en&pr=basic)

Includes CRM essentials:

*   Leads & deals management
*   Multiple pipelines
*   Tasks
*   Google Workspace integration
*   1 messenger account

Basic Plus
----------

Advanced features for growing teams.

$34 $42

per user/month, billed annually per user/month, billed monthly

[Start free trial](https://nethunt.com/web/?rg=GLOBAL&l=en&pr=basicplus)

All Basic features, plus:

*   Mass email campaigns & analytics
*   Personalized emails
*   Extra folders and views
*   2 custom roles
*   Personal messengers
*   WhatsApp integration

Business
--------

Multichannel sales and automation tools.

Talk to us $60

per user/month, billed annually per user/month, billed monthly

[Start free trial](https://nethunt.com/web/?rg=GLOBAL&l=en&pr=business)

All Basic+ features, plus:

*   Sales automation
*   Contact enrichment
*   Multi-channel sequences
*   VoIP integrations
*   Professional Network integration
*   Sales & team activity reports
*   API Access

Business Plus
-------------

Deep automation for scaling businesses.

Talk to us $84

per user/month, billed annually per user/month, billed monthly

[Start free trial](https://nethunt.com/web/?rg=GLOBAL&l=en&pr=businessplus)

All Business features, plus:

*   Extra automation workflows & actions
*   Extra email campaigns
*   Extra custom roles
*   NetHunt logo removal (web forms)
*   Hourly Google Contacts Sync
*   Dedicated account manager
*   Business consulting

Сustom annual only
------------------

We'll create a custom plan just for you.

Talk to us Talk to us

per user/month, billed annually per user/month

For teams of 10 users or more

**Tailor-made plan for your business:** Select the features you want, and we'll build a plan that fits your needs. Get in touch for a personalized quote.

Compare plans
-------------

Basic

Basic+

Business

Business+

Custom

Contacts

People associated with the companies and deals that you are trying to convert.

Leads

Potential customers or contacts who have expressed interest in a company's products or services, but have not yet made a purchase.

Deals

Potential sales opportunities with a customer or prospect.

Multiple pipelines

Customize existing pipelines and create new ones to get valuable insights into your sales process.

Filters / views

Filter, group, and sort data the way you need it. Save views for quick access and share them with your team.

Call logs and meeting notes

Keep track of every call with the customer with a summary of a conversation.

Tasks and reminders

Create the list of your to-dos and get reminders when the deadline is approaching.

Documents / files

Store and attach files to customer records or deals.

@Mentions and comments

Collaborate with collegues by @mentioning them on records or posting comments.

Bulk update

Update multiple records' fields: stage, status, priority, manager.

Duplicates management

Get rid of duplicates by merging several contacts, companies, or deals.

Mobile access

Use NetHunt on the go with iOS and Android applications.

Gmail add-on

Get access to CRM data from the emails in Gmail app.

Activity logging

Keep track of every changes or interactions within records.

Team collaboration

Tag teammates on customer records or deals when you need their help.

Reminders

Never miss a deadline for a task with friendly nudges.

Actions and Emails

Workflows consist of triggers and actions. A trigger is an event that starts your workflow, while action is what happens after your workflow is triggered. Actions include Create or update record, Create a task, Send an email, Slack or Google Chat message.

More Actions are available for purchase at any time

Workflows

Number of automated sequences that are set up and activated in the Workspace.

50

80

custom

Sales Automation

Automated email logging

Automatically link your emails to the related contacts, companies, and deals.

Create a new contact from email in one click

Create records in one click from the incoming or outgoing emails and get emails.

Webhooks

Automatically push data to and from NetHunt CRM using webhooks to exchange data between your favorite services.

Lead generating Web Forms

Place NetHunt's web forms on your website to gather leads. Get CRM records already enriched with data from the web form.

NetHunt CRM brand removal (Web Forms)

Remove NetHunt's logo from the website forms to ensure proper branding of your business.

Lead distribution

Create rules to automatically assign leads to your team members.

Record updates

Automatically change field values of the records.

Pipeline automation

Create rules to automatically update/change deal status.

Tasks creation

Automatically create tasks for your teammates.

PDF creation

Create and send PDF files with unique information from customer records.

Email notifications

Send important notifications about customers or deals to managers or the entire team via emails.

Slack notifications

Send important notifications about customers or deals to managers or the entire team via Slack channels.

Google Chat notifications

Send important notifications about customers or deals to managers or the entire team via Google Chat Spaces.

Multi-channel sequences

Launch effective multi-channel outreach sequences that combine email and Professional Network messages.

Emailing Automation

Contacts segmentation

Target people based on their behavior and interests to keep your emails and offers relevant.

Personal email templates

Save time by using plain-text of designed email templates.

Shared email templates

Share email templates with your team for the most repetitive questions or requests.

10 templates

15 templates

25 templates

75 templates

custom

HTML templates import

Send designed email marketing campaigns to enhance your branding and improve campaign results.

Email opt-out

Add unsubscribe link to your emails for an easy request to be removed from an email list.

Email open tracking

See if your prospects open your emails and how many times to qualify leads and improve email campaign performance.

Email link tracking

Track when and what links embedded in your emails are clicked by the recipient.

Custom domain for email tracking

Improve email deliverability and enhance your branding by adding your own, unique domain to use exclusively to track opens and clicks in your emails.

Email campaigns

Send personalized email campaigns to multiple recipients at once.

Email campaign analytics

Understand how successful your email campaign is to improve your future sales and marketing efforts.

Email sequences

Set up automated follow-ups to nurture leads and increase conversions.

Macroses / Email personalization

Automatically pull data from CRM records to your emails for maximum personalization.

Send test emails

Ensure your email looks good on various devices by sending test emails.

Custom SMTP

Set up custom SMTP to be in a full control of your emails and bypass daily Gmail emails limits.

Activity Reports

Get to know what your team is doing daily (emails, demos, calls etc.)

Sales Performance Reports

Track how many deals your entire team and individual team members close and how much revenue they bring.

Company and User Goals

Track how close your entire team and individual team members are to achieving set goals.

Integration with Looker Studio

Use our integration with Looker Studio to build advanced reports and combine data from multiple sources in a single dashboard.

Intercom chat

Professional Network

Slack integration

Zapier Integration

Make integration

Apollo

Find verified email addresses of your prospects and automatically add them to CRM records.

Hunter

Gmail

Access your CRM from inside Gmail with a special browser extension. There's also an extension available to Safari and Firefox users.

Google Calendar

Google Chat

Unlimited custom fields

Add unique to your business fields to leads', deals', and contacts' records.

Folders

Organize deals, companies or contacts that you work with in separate folders. Customize folders the way you need it.

4

7

10

20

custom

Personal views

Filter, sort, and save your data in any way you need right in your inbox.

Shared views per folder

Save views for quick data access and share them with your teammates.

Advanced filters

Slice the data and represent it the way you need it with the help of advanced filters.

Custom roles

Assign your teammates different roles to manage their permissions in the CRM.

1 custom role

2 custom roles

7 custom roles

10 custom roles

custom

Data import / export

Import your customer data from a spreadsheet or another CRM system.

Hidden fields

Limit visibility of sensitive record fields for certain user roles

Formula fields

Eliminate potential human errors and let the system to calculate different types of values, including numeric values, text values, etc.

Statistical fields

Get statistical data about your deals or contacts automatically. For example, total emails count, number of days in stage, last interaction date etc.

Required fields

Define the fields that must be filled by your team upon certain actions.

2-factor authentication

Enhance your account security with two-factor email verification.

World-class data storage

Your data is securily stored on Google servers.

Google Security Assessment

NetHunt CRM successfully passes annual Google Security Assessment Program.

Permissions & Visibility Settings

Give every role in your team the right level of access to the CRM data.

Knowledge Base

Get access to articles in Knowledge Base to learn more about the system and find out the answers to the most frequently asked questions.

Live Chat

Get help from our product experts via live chat.

Online User Community access

Ask questions, share your experience and product ideas with other NetHunt CRM users and product experts.

Email Support

Get help from our product experts via email.

within 24 hrs

within 24 hrs

within 24 hrs

within 12 hrs

custom

Phone Support

Get help from our product experts via online call.

1 assistant call/mo

custom

Dedicated Customer Success Manager

Partner with our manager to review your current business processes and set up NetHunt CRM workspace for maximum effectiveness.

Questions you may have

Pricing questions
-----------------

NetHunt CRM offers five plan options designed to meet different business needs: Basic, Basic Plus, Business, Business Plus and Advanced. Pricing is per user in a workspace, with the choice of monthly or annual billing for each plan. We recommend exploring each plan’s features to find the best fit, and you can start with a 14-day free trial to test the platform before deciding.

After the 14-day free trial, you’ll need to select a subscription plan to continue using NetHunt CRM. Your data will remain secure, but your workspace will be locked until you choose a plan.

During the trial period, you’ll have access to all NetHunt CRM features, with the exception of using custom SMTP for email campaigns.

Sure! The 14-day free trial period has no user limitations: you can invite as many colleagues to your workspace as you need.

Annual billing offers a 20% discount compared to monthly billing, helping you save on long-term costs.

You can subscribe to a plan using your credit or debit card.

You can easily change your plan at any time. Check our [tutorial](https://help.nethunt.com/en/articles/2628744-how-to-change-a-subscription-plan) on how to upgrade/downgrade your plan.

Yes, startups founded less than 3 years ago can apply for a 75% discount on the Business plan for the first 12 months. You can apply for the Special NetHunt CRM Startup Plan [here](https://nethunt.com/crm-for-startups).

Yes! Non-profit organizations can receive a 25% discount. To apply, please email us at [sales@nethunt.com](mailto:sales@nethunt.com).

No, all our plans are all-inclusive with no hidden costs or extra charges for features. You may only need to purchase additional automation actions if you exceed the monthly limit included in your plan.

NetHunt does not issue refunds. You can cancel anytime, but no refund is provided for any unused portion of your subscription. Please refer to our refund policy or contact our support team for assistance.

Request a personalized product demo with our product expert

features: Custom features based on business needs
